title: Volume of trade and demand for cash crop labor

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the relative volume of trade to different destinations as shown on the map?

choices.label: The need for labor in new mining centers
The traditional use of enslaved soldiers by the Ottoman Empire
The increasing demand for labor on cash crop plantations
The growing desire for household servants among emerging commercial elites

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
